attributes.action: Call a referendum of Londoners asking if they wish to be independent from the UK
attributes.additional_details:
London has a population larger than many independent countries.
There are several examples of very successful city states.
As an independent country London would be viable and have a large prosperous economy.
It already has the political structures to enable a transfer of sovereignty.
It is clearly culturally different from the rest of the united kingdom.
There is a growing divergence between London and the rest of the UK and this would benefit both London and the rest of the UK
attributes.background:
Londoners voted overwhelmingly to remain in the EU and therefore Londoners should be given the opportunity to vote leave the UK and become an independent city state.
London has a diverse culture and is different from the rest of the UK, politically, economically and culturally.
